equipment.description_en: A wave of Flame that can set fire to enemies before me.
equipment.description_cn: 一股能够点燃面前敌人的火焰之波。

equipment.description_en: A simple fireball projectile. May light enemies on fire.
equipment.description_cn: 一个简单的火球投射物，可能点燃敌人。

equipment.description_en: I summon a few fireflies to aid me in battle.
equipment.description_cn: 我召唤少量萤火虫在战斗中协助我。

equipment.description_en: Flames erupt along the targeted path for a brief time.
equipment.description_cn: 在目标路径上短暂地喷发出火焰。

equipment.description_en: Any source of fire in the target area is consumed and explodes.
equipment.description_cn: 目标区域内的任何火源都会被消耗并爆炸。

equipment.description_en: A small projectile that explodes upon contact.
equipment.description_cn: 一个小型投射物，接触时爆炸。

equipment.description_en: An icy shockwave chills all enemies around me.
equipment.description_cn: 一股冰冷的冲击波会冻结我周围的所有敌人。

equipment.description_en: A beam of ice that freezes everything in its path.
equipment.description_cn: 一道冰光束，冻结路径上的一切。

equipment.description_en: Summon a few iceflies to aid me in battle.
equipment.description_cn: 召唤少量冰萤在战斗中协助我。

equipment.description_en: My skin becomes like stone, deflecting the next attack.
equipment.description_cn: 我的皮肤变得如石头般坚硬，能偏转下一次攻击。

equipment.description_en: All attacks with the coated weapon may poison my opponent. Lost when sheathed.
equipment.description_cn: 使用涂毒武器攻击时可能使敌人中毒。收刀时效果消失。

equipment.description_en: A cage of sharp roots surrounds my target.
equipment.description_cn: 用尖锐的树根形成的牢笼困住目标。

equipment.description_en: Thorned bushes sprout along the targeted area for a brief moment.
equipment.description_cn: 在目标区域短暂地生长出带刺的灌木丛。

equipment.description_en: Corrupts blood slimes into acidic oozes and compels both slimes and oozes to join me.
equipment.description_cn: 将血粘液腐蚀成酸性粘液怪，并驱使粘液和粘液怪加入我方。

equipment.description_en: Nearby foliage comes to life and defends for a short period of time.
equipment.description_cn: 使附近的植物活化，在短时间内为我方提供防御。

equipment.description_en: Teleport to the target location. This will also confuse my opponents.
equipment.description_cn: 传送到目标位置。此举还会使敌人困惑。

equipment.description_en: Summon a lightning elemental to aid me.
equipment.description_cn: 召唤一个闪电元素来协助我。
